law.history: Repealed 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 20, effective August 1, 2008. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 426, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 464, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1986.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Duty of Department of Revenue -- Duty of secretary of Finance and Administration Cabinet.
